channel.title: Misc problems on Windows 10
channel.description:
Hi , I've just installed Axoloti on Windows 10 , I used to use it on mac and there was no problem, and since I'm new on windows can't debug these problems:
Community folder does not appear when creating object. Only the factory folder shows up. On harddisk the community folder is empty (just a .git file ghosted). Problem with mouse , does not respond properly,
When Axoloti opens there is a message that sys: User library version mismatch do you want to upgrade? Whatever I say "yes " or "no" then sync library, THis message always shows up.
When synscing library there is a failure that says: Sync (pull)FAILED: community (1.0.12, anon). any idea??

item.title: Misc problems on Windows 10
item.dc:creator: @berzelius
item.description:
@berzelius wrote:

Thanks now it works !!

Read full topic

item.title: Misc problems on Windows 10
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

File -> preferences -> reset all (libraries)

Read full topic

item.title: Misc problems on Windows 10
item.dc:creator: @berzelius
item.description:
@berzelius wrote:

Hi ,
I've just installed Axoloti on Windows 10 , I used to use it on mac and there was no problem, and since I'm new on windows can't debug these problems:

Community folder does not appear when creating object. Only the factory folder shows up. On harddisk the community folder is empty (just a .git file ghosted).
Problem with mouse , does not respond properly,

When Axoloti opens there is a message that sys: User library version mismatch do you want to upgrade?
Whatever I say "yes " or "no" then sync library, THis message always shows up.

When synscing library there is a failure that says:
Sync (pull)FAILED: community (1.0.12, anon).
any idea??

Read full topic
